l4/util/lock_wq.h

00019 #ifndef __L4UTIL_LOCK_WQ_H__
00020 #define __L4UTIL_LOCK_WQ_H__
00021 
00022 #include <l4/sys/types.h>
00023 //#include <l4/sys/syscalls.h>
00024 #include <l4/sys/ipc.h>
00025 #include <l4/util/atomic.h>
00026 
00027 EXTERN_C_BEGIN
00028 
00029 typedef struct l4util_wq_lock_queue_elem_t
00030 {
00031   volatile struct l4util_wq_lock_queue_elem_t *next, *prev;
00032   l4_cap_idx_t    id;
00033 } l4util_wq_lock_queue_elem_t;
00034 
00035 typedef struct
00036 {
00037   l4util_wq_lock_queue_elem_t *last;
00038 } l4util_wq_lock_queue_base_t;
00039 
00040 static inline int
00041 l4util_wq_lock_lock(l4util_wq_lock_queue_base_t *queue,
00042         l4util_wq_lock_queue_elem_t *q,
00043                     l4_cap_idx_t myself);
00044 static inline int
00045 l4util_wq_lock_unlock(l4util_wq_lock_queue_base_t *queue,
00046           l4util_wq_lock_queue_elem_t *q);
00047 static inline int
00048 l4util_wq_lock_locked(l4util_wq_lock_queue_base_t *queue);
00049 
00050 /* Implementation */
00051 inline int
00052 l4util_wq_lock_lock(l4util_wq_lock_queue_base_t *queue,
00053         l4util_wq_lock_queue_elem_t *q,
00054                     l4_cap_idx_t myself)
00055 {
00056   l4util_wq_lock_queue_elem_t *old;
00057   l4_msgtag_t err;
00058 
00059   q->next = 0;
00060   q->id   = myself;
00061   old     = (l4util_wq_lock_queue_elem_t*)
00062         l4util_xchg((l4_umword_t*)(&queue->last), (l4_umword_t)q);
00063   if (old != 0)
00064     {
00065       /* already locked */
00066       old->next = q;
00067       q->prev   = old;
00068       err = l4_ipc_receive(old->id, L4_IPC_NEVER);
00069       if (L4_IPC_ERROR(l4_utcb()->error))
00070   return l4_utcb()->error;
00071       err = l4_ipc_send(old->id, l4_msgtag(0, 0, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00072       if (L4_IPC_ERROR(l4_utcb()->error))
00073   return l4_utcb()->error;
00074     }
00075   return 0;
00076 }
00077 
00078 inline int
00079 l4util_wq_lock_unlock(l4util_wq_lock_queue_base_t *queue,
00080                       l4util_wq_lock_queue_elem_t *q)
00081 {
00082   volatile l4util_wq_lock_queue_elem_t *other;
00083   l4_msgtag_t err;
00084 
00085   other = (l4util_wq_lock_queue_elem_t*)
00086       l4util_cmpxchg_res((l4_umword_t*)(&queue->last),
00087                                                     (l4_umword_t)q,
00088                                                     (l4_umword_t)NULL);
00089   if (other == q)
00090     {
00091       /* nobody wants the lock */
00092     }
00093   else
00094     {
00095       /* someone wants the lock */
00096       while(q->next != other)
00097   {
00098     /* 2 possibilities:
00099        - other is next, but didn't sign, give it the time
00100        - other is not next, find the next by backward iteration */
00101     if (other->prev == NULL)
00102       {
00103         /* - other didn't sign its prev, give it the time to do this */
00104         //l4_thread_switch(other->id);
00105               // FIXME: what to do?
00106       }
00107     else if (other->prev!=q)
00108       {
00109         /* 2 poss:
00110      - if other is next it might be signed up to now
00111        (other->prev == q)
00112        - other is not something else then next (its not NULL,
00113          we know this), go backward */
00114         other = other->prev;
00115       }
00116   }
00117       /* now we have the next in other */
00118       /* send an ipc, timeout never */
00119       err = l4_ipc_call(q->next->id, l4_msgtag(0, 0, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00120       if (L4_IPC_IS_ERROR(l4_utcb()->error))
00121   return L4_IPC_ERROR(l4_utcb()->error);
00122     }
00123   return 0;
00124 }
00125 
00126 inline int
00127 l4util_wq_lock_locked(l4util_wq_lock_queue_base_t *queue)
00128 {
00129   return queue->last != NULL;
00130 }
00131 
00132 EXTERN_C_END
00133 
00134 #endif
